titleStmt.title: The arraignment, conviction and condemnation of the Westminsterian-Juncto's engagement with a cautionarie exhortation to all honest English spirits to avoid the danger of perjurie by taking of it.
titleStmt.author: Prynne, William, 1600-1669.

notesStmt.note: Attributed to William Prynne. Cf. NUC pre-1956 imprints.
